A LINQ-enabled object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 启用数据绑定方案[!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)]，并且可从创建一个类型化或非类型化，提供该表的默认视图。 enables data-binding scenarios for [!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)] and can be created from a typed or untyped , providing a default view of that table. 在从 创建 后，可以在其上设置筛选和排序。Filtering and sorting can be set on the after it has been created from a . 然后绑定到 UI 控件，如或，提供简单数据绑定模型。The is then bound to a UI control, such as a or a , providing a simple data binding model. 有关详细信息和示例，请参阅[创建 DataView 对象](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/creating-a-dataview-object-linq-to-dataset.md)。For more information and examples, see [Creating a DataView Object](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/creating-a-dataview-object-linq-to-dataset.md). ## Examples 下面的示例创建从 SalesOrderDetail 表并将其设置的数据源对象，该代理的对象控件：The following example creates a from the SalesOrderDetail table and sets it as the data source of a object, which acts as a proxy for a control: [!code-csharp[DP DataView Samples#CreateLDVFromTable](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DP DataView Samples/CS/Form1.cs#createldvfromtable)] [!code-vb[DP DataView Samples#CreateLDVFromTable](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DP DataView Samples/VB/Form1.vb#createldvfromtable)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 启用数据绑定方案[!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)]，并且可从创建[!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)]查询。 enables data binding scenarios for [!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)] and can be created from a [!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)] query. 表示查询本身并不是基于查询的视图。The represents the query itself, and is not a view on top of the query. 新创建推断的筛选和排序信息从其创建的查询。The newly created infers the filtering and sorting information from the query it is created from. 然后绑定到 UI 控件，如或，提供一个简单的数据绑定模型。The is then bound to a UI control, such as a or a , providing a simple data-binding model. 将参数`T`输入参数的`source`只能是类型的派生的类型或。The parameter `T` of the input parameter `source` can only be of type or a type derived from . 下面的查询运算符，仅支持在查询中用于创建:The following query operators, only, are supported in a query used to create : - - - - - - - 有关详细信息和示例，请参阅[创建 DataView 对象](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/creating-a-dataview-object-linq-to-dataset.md)。For more information and examples, see [Creating a DataView Object](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/creating-a-dataview-object-linq-to-dataset.md). ## Examples 下面的示例创建按照欠款总额排序的在线订单的：The following example creates a of online orders ordered by total due: [!code-csharp[DP DataView Samples#CreateLDVFromQuery1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DP DataView Samples/CS/Form1.cs#createldvfromquery1)] [!code-vb[DP DataView Samples#CreateLDVFromQuery1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DP DataView Samples/VB/Form1.vb#createldvfromquery1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[vbteclinqext](~/includes/vbteclinqext-md.md)] 查询适用于实现的数据源接口或接口。 queries work on data sources that implement the interface or the interface. 类不实现任何一个接口，因此您必须调用方法以使用中的源`From`子句[!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)]查询。The class does not implement either interface, so you must call the method to use the as a source in the `From` clause of a [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] query. 你还可以获取自定义的特定于域的运算符，如，通过返回对象。You can also obtain custom, domain-specific operators, such as , by returning an object. 返回的可枚举对象方法永久绑定到，生成它。The enumerable object returned by the method is permanently bound to the that produced it. 多次调用方法，将返回多个独立的可查询对象的所有绑定到源。Multiple calls to the method will return multiple, independent queryable objects that are all bound to the source . ## Examples 在以下示例中，`DisplayProducts`方法接收包含名为一个 DataColumn 数据表`ProductName`，提取`ProductName`值，然后将值输出。In the following sample, the `DisplayProducts` method receives a DataTable that contains a DataColumn named `ProductName`, extracts the `ProductName` values and then prints the values. [!code-csharp[system.data.DataTableExtensions.AsEnumerable#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.data.datatableextensions.asenumerable/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[system.data.DataTableExtensions.AsEnumerable#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.data.datatableextensions.asenumerable/vb/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Returns a that contains copies of the objects, given an input object where the generic parameter is .

returns.span: A that contains the input sequence as the type of objects.

span.span: A that contains the input sequence as the type of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将参数`T`输入参数的`source`只能是类型的派生的类型或。The parameter `T` of the input parameter `source` can only be of type or a type derived from . 输入的序列可以是任意源，不仅能查询通过。The input sequence can be any source, not only a query or a query over a . 请注意，是否源序列是一个查询，调用此运算符将强制立即执行。Note that if the source sequence is a query, calling this operator will force immediate execution. 枚举源序列也会导致引发异常。Enumerating the source sequence can also cause exceptions to be thrown. 目标表的架构基于第一个架构源序列中的行。The schema of the destination table is based on the schema of the first row in the source sequence. 从提取表元数据元数据和表值列的值从。The table metadata is extracted from the metadata and the table values from the column values of the . 对于类型化，类型不会保留。For a typed , types are not preserved. 传输的数据和架构，但生成的输出表的行不会的类型化类型。The data and schema are transferred, but the resulting rows of the output table will not be of the typed type. 并属性不会保留在源中复制期间为返回。The and properties are not preserved during the copy from the source to the returned . 当**null**引用或值为 null 的类型**null**在源中找到，此方法将替换目标中的值值为。When a **null** reference or nullable type with a value of **null** is found in a source , this method replaces the value in the destination with a value of . 生成的方法返回的表具有默认表名称。The generated table returned by the method has the default table name. 如果你想要命名，将其附加到，或执行任何其他特定操作，您必须之后执行此操作已创建并返回的表。If you want to name the , attach it to a , or perform any other specific operation, you must do so after the table is created and returned. 有关详细信息，请参阅[创建查询 DataTable 从](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/creating-a-datatable-from-a-query-linq-to-dataset.md)。For more information, see [Creating a DataTable From a Query](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/creating-a-datatable-from-a-query-linq-to-dataset.md). ## Examples 以下示例查询 SalesOrderHeader 表的订单后 2001 年 8 月 8 日，并使用方法来创建从该查询。The following example queries the SalesOrderHeader table for orders after August 8, 2001, and uses the method to create a from that query. 然后将 绑定到作为 的代理的 。The is then bound to a , which acts as proxy for a . [!code-csharp[DP LINQ to DataSet Examples#CopyToDataTable1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DP LINQ to DataSet Examples/CS/Program.cs#copytodatatable1)] [!code-vb[DP LINQ to DataSet Examples#CopyToDataTable1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DP LINQ to DataSet Examples/VB/Module1.vb#copytodatatable1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将参数`T`输入参数的`source`只能是类型的，或从派生的类型。The parameter `T` of the input parameter `source` can only be of type , or a type derived from . 输入的序列可以是任意源，不只一个查询通过。The input sequence can be any source, not only a query over a . 请注意，是否源序列是一个查询，调用此运算符将强制立即执行。Note that if the source sequence is a query, calling this operator will force immediate execution. 枚举源序列也会导致引发异常。Enumerating the source sequence can also cause exceptions to be thrown. 目标表的架构基于第一个架构源序列中的行。The schema of the destination table is based on the schema of the first row in the source sequence. 从提取表元数据元数据和表值列的值从。The table metadata is extracted from the metadata and the table values from the column values of the . 对于类型化，类型不会保留。For a typed , types are not preserved. 传输的数据和架构，但生成的输出表的行不会的类型化类型。The data and schema are transferred, but the resulting rows of the output table will not be of the typed type. 并属性不会保留在源中复制期间为返回。The and properties are not preserved during the copy from the source to the returned . 当**null**引用或值为 null 的类型**null**在源中找到，此方法将替换目标中的值值为。When a **null** reference or nullable type with a value of **null** is found in a source , this method replaces the value in the destination with a value of . 生成的方法返回的表具有默认表名称。The generated table returned by the method has the default table name. 如果你想要命名，将其附加到，或执行任何其他特定操作，您必须之后执行此操作已创建并返回的表。If you want to name the , attach it to a , or perform any other specific operation, you must do so after the table is created and returned. 有关详细信息，请参阅[创建查询 DataTable 从](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/creating-a-datatable-from-a-query-linq-to-dataset.md)。For more information, see [Creating a DataTable From a Query](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/creating-a-datatable-from-a-query-linq-to-dataset.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将参数`T`输入参数的`source`只能是类型的，或从派生的类型。The parameter `T` of the input parameter `source` can only be of type , or a type derived from . 输入的序列可以是任意源，不只一个查询通过。The input sequence can be any source, not only a query over a . 请注意，是否源序列是一个查询，调用此运算符将强制立即执行。Note that if the source sequence is a query, calling this operator will force immediate execution. 枚举源序列也会导致引发异常。Enumerating the source sequence can also cause exceptions to be thrown. 目标表的架构基于第一个架构源序列中的行。The schema of the destination table is based on the schema of the first row in the source sequence. 从提取表元数据元数据和表值列的值从。The table metadata is extracted from the metadata and the table values from the column values of the . 对于类型化，类型不会保留。For a typed , types are not preserved. 传输的数据和架构，但生成的输出表的行不会的类型化类型。The data and schema are transferred, but the resulting rows of the output table will not be of the typed type. 并属性不会保留在源中复制期间为返回。The and properties are not preserved during the copy from the source to the returned . 当**null**引用或值为 null 的类型**null**在源中找到，此方法将替换目标中的值值为。When a **null** reference or nullable type with a value of **null** is found in a source , this method replaces the value in the destination with a value of . 生成的方法返回的表具有默认表名称。The generated table returned by the method has the default table name. 如果你想要命名，将其附加到，或执行任何其他特定操作，您必须之后执行此操作已创建并返回的表。If you want to name the , attach it to a , or perform any other specific operation, you must do so after the table is created and returned. 如果过程中引发异常的数据行复制到目标表中，如约束异常`errorHandler`调用委托。If an exception is thrown during the copy of a data row into the target table, such as a constraint exception, the `errorHandler` delegate is called. 一个传递给`errorHandler`委托具有以下值：A is passed to the `errorHandler` delegate with the following values: - 属性设置为源数据的副本。The property is set to a copy of the source data. - 属性设置为目标。The property is set to the target . - 属性设置为已捕获的异常。The property is set to the caught exception. 委托调用返回后，属性为只读。The property is read after the delegate call returns. 如果属性是`true`，源序列将继续进行枚举和加载到数据的表。If the property is `true`, the source sequence continues to be enumerated and loaded into the data table. 如果属性是`false`，从引发原始异常方法。If the property is `false`, the original exception is thrown from the method. 有关详细信息，请参阅[创建查询 DataTable 从](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/creating-a-datatable-from-a-query-linq-to-dataset.md)。For more information, see [Creating a DataTable From a Query](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/creating-a-datatable-from-a-query-linq-to-dataset.md).
